name: Space Shooter (tutorial project)
description:
• Use WSAD to move the spaceship and click mouse to shoot.
  • If you die, you may have to relaunch the application to play again.
  • Learned how to create and destroy assets off screen.
  • Learned how to keep player and camera bound to a limited area.
  • Learned about game feel, like how this game is designed to feel like an old arcade game.
  • Learned about asset implementation.
